word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，泛指为从事某种职业而进行的身体或智力方面的训练。
指把所学的理论或知识用于实践以获得技艺与技巧。
主要指为强壮体魄而进行的锻炼，也可指进行练习以保持已经获得的技巧。
侧重进行有系统的，严格和重复的练习。
既可指训练又可指为达到某种熟练程度而进行的约束。

bilingual.source: I want to get a lot of exercise.
Doing more exercise is a good idea.
I love sports and often do exercise.
Exercise such as playing sports is fun.
bilingual.target: 例如运动这样的锻炼是有趣的。

bilingual.source: She's doing exercise, but it gets too hot.
bilingual.target: 她在做运动，但天气太热了。

bilingual.source: Second, get some exercise, such as running.
bilingual.target: 其次，做一些运动，比如跑步。

bilingual.source: Decide what exercise is the most suitable for you.
bilingual.target: 决定哪种运动最适合你。

bilingual.source: Stand up and do some exercise from time to time.
bilingual.target: 站起来，时不时做些运动。

list.abstract: exercise，英文单词，名词、及物动词、不及物动词，作名词时意为“运动；练习；运用；操练；礼拜；典礼”，作及物动词时意为“锻炼；练习；使用；使忙碌；使惊恐”，作不及物动词时意为“运动；练习”。

yingyinNormal.en: When was the last actual exercise you got?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你上一次真的去运动是什么时候？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. Poor Daddy Pig. Well, at least I've done my exercise. Yes. For today. What do you mean? You'll have to do some more exercise tomorrow. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，可怜的猪爸爸.好了，至少我完成了我的运动。是的。今天的。你是什么意思？你明天必须做更多的运动。什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. Poor Daddy Pig. Well, at least I've done my exercise. Yes. For today. What do you mean? You'll have to do some more exercise tomorrow. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，可怜的猪爸爸.好了，至少我完成了我的运动。是的。今天的。你是什么意思？你明天必须做更多的运动。什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe Daddy will have more success with my old exercise bike.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许爸爸会更有成效用我的旧运动自行车的话。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe Daddy will have more success with my old exercise bike.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许爸爸会更有成效用我的旧运动自行车的话。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, to get fit, you have to exercise every day. Oh, no.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，为了保持健康，你必须每天都做运动。噢，不。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, to get fit, you have to exercise every day. Oh, no.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，为了保持健康，你必须每天都做运动。噢，不。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe I should do a bit of exercise. Yes, Daddy. And I will start tomorrow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许我是应该做点运动了。是的，爸爸。那我明天开始。

yingyinNormal.en: Hm. Maybe I should do a bit of exercise. Yes, Daddy. And I will start tomorrow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯……也许我是应该做点运动了。是的，爸爸。那我明天开始.

yingyinNormal.en: Wow, that's a big potato. I declare this sports centre open. Fantastic. We must all exercise and eat fruit and vegetables.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇，好大的一个土豆啊。我宣布这个运动中心开业！非常的不错！我们必须都运动起来，并且每天都要吃水果和蔬菜。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm also planning to begin an exercise regimen designed to strengthen my cardiovascular system. AKA jogging.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还打算开始一种运动养生法加强我的心血管系统，也就是慢跑。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I don't know. I kind of promised myself I'd get off the computer, be more physically active. Get some exercise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我说不准，我答应过自己要远离电脑，多点锻炼身体，多做些运动。

yingyinNormal.en: According to a recent study, simply thinking about exercise, even while sitting still, can have physical benefits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近一份研究指出哪怕你赖着不动，只要心中想着运动，就能给身体带来好处。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm good at eating fruit and vegetables. And exercise is important. Today you can see me open a new sports centre in town.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就是经常吃水果和蔬菜的。还有坚持锻炼是很重要的。今天我的运动中心要在小镇里开业，欢迎前来。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you exercise? When I have to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您平时锻炼吗？除非必要。

yingyinNormal.en: So much for Daddy Pig and his exercise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸也只是嘴上说说要锻炼。

yingyinNormal.en: So much for Daddy Pig and his exercise. Eh? what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸也只是嘴上说说要锻炼。怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: Thank goodness. I don't have to exercise. I'm naturally fit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢天谢地，我不需要锻炼，我天生很健康。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank goodness. I don't have to exercise. I'm naturally fit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢天谢地，我不需要锻炼，我天生很健康。

yingyinNormal.en: What did you mean by it? That it was a pointless exercise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你是什么意思？指这个提议是在做无用功。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 运动; 训练; 演习

examination_example.sentence: The two highly recommended lifestyle approaches are maintaining or increasing your level of aerobic <highlight>exercise</highlight> and following a Mediterranean-style diet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这两种强烈推荐的生活方式是保持或增加你的有氧运动水平，遵循地中海式饮食。

examination_example.sentence: It is like the immune system of the body, which under stress or through lack of nutrition or <highlight>exercise</highlight> can be weakened.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就像人体的免疫系统一样，在处于压力或缺乏营养或锻炼的情况下，免疫系统会减弱。

examination_example.sentence: It turns out that the brain needs <highlight>exercise</highlight> in much the same way our muscles do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，大脑和我们的肌肉一样需要锻炼。

examination_example.sentence: Ensure that consumers will not be confused or misled when seeking to <highlight>exercise</highlight> their data privacy rights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确保消费者在寻求行使其数据隐私权时不会被混淆或误导。

examination_example.sentence: We have been actively <highlight>exercising</highlight> our civil rights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们一直在积极行使我们的公民权利。

examination_example.sentence: We more than ever need people in the workplace who can take initiative and <highlight>exercise</highlight> their imagination "to respond to unexpected events".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们比以往任何时候都更需要那些在工作中可以发挥主动性、运用想象力“以应对突发事件”的人才。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They factored in the effects of certain health behaviors, including <highlight>exercise</highlight> levels, sleep habits and diet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们考虑了某些健康行为的影响，包括锻炼水平、睡眠习惯和饮食。

examination_example.sentence: They strengthen with regular <highlight>exercise</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们通过定期锻炼来增强力量。

examination_example.sentence: To an extent, we can postpone the eventual stop of cells' dividing through nutrition, <highlight>exercise</highlight>, good sleep and even relaxation techniques.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某种程度上，我们可以通过合理膳食、锻炼、良好的睡眠甚至一些放松技巧来推迟细胞分裂的最终停止。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Exercise</highlight> caution about the use of absence claims.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谨慎使用缺勤限额。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers, however, <highlight>exercise</highlight> caution by warning no one single response is the perfect remedy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，研究人员谨慎地警告说，没有一种单一的反应是完美的补救办法。

examination_example.sentence: Those who <highlight>exercise</highlight> caution in making major decisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在做出重大决策时保持谨慎的人。

word_usage.usage: 某人练习某事，常用exercise oneself in sth./doing sth.表达。如：我想练习扔手榴弹。I want to exercise myself in throwing hand-grenades.

exercise作名词表示“运动”时，前面加冠词，则特指“某项运动”。
Walking is a good exercise.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 既可指训练又可指为达到某种熟练程度而进行的约束。
侧重进行有系统的, 严格和重复的练习。
主要指为强壮体魄而进行的锻炼, 也可指进行练习以保持已经获得的技巧。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Exercise</highlight> is more important to good health than diet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比起节食，锻炼对健康更重要。

examination_example.sentence: There are a lot of studies on the relationship between breakfast eating and possible health outcomes, but this may be because those who eat breakfast choose to habitually have health-enhancing behaviours such as regular <highlight>exercise</highlight> and not smoking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于吃早餐与可能的健康结果之间的关联，有很多研究，但这可能是因为那些吃早餐的人通常会选择有益健康的习惯和行为，比如不抽烟、经常做运动。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Exercise</highlight> releases hormones that can improve mood and relieve stress, which can also help learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 运动可以释放荷尔蒙，改善情绪，缓解压力，也有助于学习。

examination_example.sentence: An early study gave participants abundant time to complete problem-solving and word-association <highlight>exercises</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早期的一项研究给了参与者充足的时间来完成问题解决和单词联想练习。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>exercise</highlight> is simple but important, since it brings these costs out of the realm of speculation into the realm of meaningful discussion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项工作简单而重要，因为它将这些成本从推测的领域带入了有意义的讨论领域。

examination_example.sentence: At the primary level, the main aim is to cultivate good habits, like learning to plan and <highlight>exercising</highlight> self-discipline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在初级阶段，主要目的是培养好习惯，比如学习计划和锻炼自律。

word_usage.usage:
exercise作名词表示“运动”时，前面加冠词，则特指“某项运动”。
Walking is a good exercise.
某人练习某事，常用exercise oneself in sth./doing sth.表达。如：我想练习扔手榴弹。I want to exercise myself in throwing hand-grenades.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 既可指训练又可指为达到某种熟练程度而进行的约束。
侧重进行有系统的，严格和重复的练习。
主要指为强壮体魄而进行的锻炼，也可指进行练习以保持已经获得的技巧。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 一套动作; 训练活动

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 有氧运动；有氧锻炼；有氧训练

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 做运动的人；肌肉锻练器具

word_family.mean: n. 锻炼；运动；使用；运用；行使；练习；训练；演习；习题；操练

examination_example.sentence: We will be holding a free taster session on 23rd May, at 10 am, to demonstrate the variety of effective and active <highlight>exercises</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将于5月23日上午10点举行免费试听课，展示各种有效和积极的练习。

examination_example.sentence: The implication of these results is that to gain the greatest health benefits from <highlight>exercise</highlight>, it may be wise to skip eating first.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些结果的含义是，为了从运动中获得最大的健康益处，先不吃饭可能是明智的。

examination_example.sentence: Studies found that people who woke up early for <highlight>exercise</highlight> slept better than those who exercised in evening.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究发现，早起锻炼的人比晚上锻炼的人睡得好。

examination_example.sentence: The increase of energy will even make you more willing to <highlight>exercise</highlight>, and that will raise your overall energy even more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 能量的增加甚至会使你更愿意锻炼，而这将使你的整体能量得到更大的提高。

examination_example.sentence: Still, the people who <highlight>exercise</highlight> 150 minutes a week did pretty well, too, lowering their death risk by 14%.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管如此，每周锻炼150分钟的人也做得很好，降低了14%的死亡风险。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Exercising</highlight> makes you more awake and ready to handle whatever is ahead of you for the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 锻炼让你更加清醒，并准备好应对一天中的任何事情。

sense_info_list.zh: 一套动作; 训练活动

examination_example.sentence: Then, I'll teach you an <highlight>exercise</highlight> my baseball coach taught me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，我将教你一个我的棒球教练教我的训练活动。

examination_example.sentence: To recommend an <highlight>exercise</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 推荐一个训练活动。

sense_info_list.zh: 运动; 锻炼; 训练活动

examination_example.sentence: Balanced diets are just as important as regular <highlight>exercise</highlight> in our daily life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们的日常生活中，均衡的饮食和规律的锻炼一样重要。

examination_example.sentence: People practice Five-Animal <highlight>Exercises</highlight> in order to improve the health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们练习五禽戏是为了改善健康。

examination_example.sentence: Aquatic <highlight>exercise</highlight> feels easier than exercising on land.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 水上运动感觉比陆地运动更轻松。

examination_example.sentence: Read a lot and do <highlight>exercises</highlight>, and you'll get improved.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多读多做练习，你会得到提升的。

word_usage.usage: 某人练习某事，常用exercise oneself in sth./doing sth.表达。如：我想练习扔手榴弹。I want to exercise myself in throwing hand-grenades.
exercise作“运动；锻炼”讲时是不可数名词；作“体操”和“练习”讲时是可数名词。

exercise作名词表示“运动”时，前面加冠词，则特指“某项运动”。
Walking is a good exercise.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 主要指为强健体魄而进行的锻炼，也可指为保持已经获得的技巧而进行的练习。
指把所学的理论或知识用于实践，以获得技艺与技巧。
普通用词，泛指身体或智力方面的训练。
